attributes.action: cancel plans to allow council officials to enter people's homes for the purpose of revaluing them for tax purposes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is bad enough that the amount of council tax paid is based on the value of your home taken from outside without having to allow snoopers inside.  An Englishman's home used to be his castle.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
